cast.name: 安娜·佩斯科娃 Anna Peskova

introduction: Katya dreams to dance in the musical and comes to St. Petersburg to push the luck. She wants to achieve success in life, but the cruel world of show business doesn't accept the naive girl. By a lucky chance she manages to get a job the bartender in popular night club. Here Katya is waited by new acquaintances which will forever change her life. She will find the true friend, will face the cunning competitor, will deliver to the place of the gone too far managing director and will meet the romantic young man who decided to win by all means her heart.
